SEARCH
Package vlille.strategy

Class RoundRobin

java.lang.Object
vlille.strategy.RoundRobin
All Implemented Interfaces:
RedistributionStrategy
public class RoundRobin extends Object implements RedistributionStrategy
A strategy to redistribute the vehicles in the stations using a round-robin algorithm.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RoundRobin()
    A strategy to redistribute the vehicles in the stations using a round-robin algorithm.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Station>
    redistribute(List<Station> stations)
    Redistribution vehicles in the stations If a station is empty or full for more than two interval of time, the control center will redistribute the vehicles in the stations A Round Robin redistribution algorithm is use : the first station is chosen, then the second, then the third, and so on until there is no more vehicle to distribute
    String
    toString()
    Get a description of the round-robin redistribution strategy

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • redistribute

      public List<Station> redistribute(List<Station> stations)
      Redistribution vehicles in the stations If a station is empty or full for more than two interval of time, the control center will redistribute the vehicles in the stations A Round Robin redistribution algorithm is use : the first station is chosen, then the second, then the third, and so on until there is no more vehicle to distribute
      Specified by:
      redistribute in interface RedistributionStrategy
      Parameters:
      stations - the stations to redistribute
      Returns:
      the redistributed stations
